column3: I have no ability to test this.\n
Direct apple specific test for now so that this is easily backported, though it should be generic enough to apply to all darwin, I think? \n
ACK. Stepped through in the debugger on OSX to make sure the #ifdef is correct.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/e7bad10c12ce9b5d424ac273c1c977b88469d46c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
This is probably a dumb question but what exactly is meant by "untested ACK"?\n

It means the code was reviewed by reading it, but not actually trying to see if it works. In this case the fix is obviously correct.

I wonder where else fsync might be lurking.
@mikehearn in our codebase that appeared to be it.\n
